# Chill Heart (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Touched creature

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 144

A chill settles into the targetâ€™s heart and he or she gains a +4 profane bonus on saving throws against spells and effects that generate emotions (such as *[[Crushing Despair (Spell)|crushing despair]]*, rage, and fear effects). Any effects that grant a morale bonus are suppressed for the duration of the spell.
